text: I m too exhausted to keep trying So here we are again  I ve lost count of the amount of times I ve completely broken down and felt the urge to throw myself off the nearest bridge and just be done with it  I m so extremely tired  no matter how much I sleep I still want to close my eyes  I d rather not wake up again   amp x B I ve given life my everything for the past year and a half  I was depressed and miserable and still got admitted to two top   public universities in the US  But since I can t get things together financially to make it work it s yet another dream so close yet so far away from my reach  Sometimes I wonder what I could accomplish if I just found peace of mind  I know I have a lot of potential  I m self aware enough to realize that   amp x B My   years in this world have been nothing but being abused  manipulated and lied to  Sometimes it becomes excruciatingly difficult to hold in my boiling rage  That s when I am most afraid that I ll snap one day and end the lives of those who ve caused me to feel this miserable   amp x B I m tired of the existential crises at one in the morning  the mental breakdowns and the moments when I feel a glimpse of hope only to have all my willpower fade away a few hours later amp x B I get up every day  put on a fake mask and go to work where I try to pretend that everything s alright for nine hours before I go back home  to a family that s done nothing but make my life a living hell  only to have to do everything over again the next day   amp x B I can feel that I m losing both physical and mental strength every single day that passes  nowadays I get tired from a mere ten push ups  It s like I m dying  probably on account of how I have no appetite  and the last time I had any energy to exercise was months ago amp x B I just want to rest  I can t go on like this anymore

text: I m done fighting to stay in a world I don t belong in I don t belong here   I don t think I ever have   I have nothing left to offer to the world  and it has nothing left to offer to me but suffering   Why should I not kill myself   Ask even most other severely depressed people and  if you really push them  there are things they still appreciate   There is nothing I care about   Friends  family  food  hobbies  careers  love all of them are hollow   Even if someone threw everything that others live their whole lives for right into my lap  I would collapse into a ball of tears unable to feel any of it   I stare at other people in awe  almost studying them as to grasp what it s like to feel their happiness   They live more in a day than I can live in a decade   What right do THEY have to tell me not to kill myself   They are a different species in comparison I think about killing myself every day  breaking down under the weight of the pain in my mind   I ve tried to do what s right my whole life  never hurting anyone except myself   slowly dying over the course of years   My anxiety paralyzes and traps me  while my depression robs me of the ability to feel anything but pain   As if it was not bad enough that I am a psychological defective  my physical disabilities have destroyed even the most shallow and superficial experiences of life   They  and likely my mental and emotional defects  are not temporary   they will follow me until the day I die   Why not speed up that process   Why use temporary  non  solutions to permanent problems I do not feel like a real human being  but maybe that s a good thing after all   Only humans could be so cruel to force their own kind  at gunpoint or lock down if necessary  to experience unending torment solely because suicide OFFENDS them   So  why do you hate me   Why do you want people like me to suffer
summary: There is nothing left to offer to the world but suffering for people like me. I think about killing myself every day. I do not feel like a real human being but maybe that's a good thing.    It's cruel for people to force their own kind at gunpoint or lock down to experience torment solely because suicide OFFENDS them.
cleaned: leave offer world suffer people like think kill day not feel like real human maybe good thing cruel people force kind gunpoint lock experience torment solely suicide offend
